Dec. 2, 1979 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section C)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section C) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-contest-section-c
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 7 bands competed.
Jan. 7, 2015, 7:59 p.m. June 22, 2016, 3:25 p.m.
1 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Hungarian Fantasy
2 Old Silkstone Graham O'Connor Promenade
3 Horbury Victoria Band Tom Greatorex A Cotswold Suite
Unknown Result Holmfirth E. Clegg From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
Unknown Result Shepley John Sheard Four Little Maids

Unknown Result Scapegoat Hill David Hirst Four Little Maids
